Using : rxtx 2.2pre2 (prerelease)	rxtx-2.2pre2-bins.zip
http://rxtx.qbang.org/wiki/index.php/Download

Not using cloudhopper - for the reason he has a seperate
RXTXComm.jar for each binary release - not only are they
incompatible, but isn't that why we use Java? Is not to
have a bazillion different jars for each OS?
